mapper.sql: coid, coname, conumber, coteacher1, coteacher2, is_active, coacademy, cocategory, cotype, copoint, cohour, codescription, last_update_user, last_update_dt, coExamType, is_selectable
mapper.select:
select
from maritime.course where coteacher1 = #{coteacher1,jdbcType=BIGINT} and is_active = true

select distinct coid, coname, conumber, coteacher1, coteacher2, c.is_active, coacademy, cocategory, cotype, copoint, cohour, codescription, c.last_update_user, c.last_update_dt, coExamType from maritime.course c inner join maritime.scmapping p on pcid = c.coid and p.is_active = true where psid = #{psid,jdbcType=BIGINT} and c.is_active = true

select c.coid,c.coname,c.conumber,t.tname as teacher, a.aname as academy,cate.ldvalue as category,type.ldvalue as type,c.copoint, c.cohour,examt.ldvalue as examtype,s.spositon as position,week.ldvalue as week, section.ldvalue as section,s.sdescription as sdescription,fre.ldvalue as freq, s.all_people as allPeople,s.remain_people as remainPeople,s.sid as scheid from maritime.course c inner join maritime.schedule s on s.scid = c.coid and s.is_active = true left join maritime.teacher t on c.coteacher1 = t.tid and t.is_active = true left join maritime.academy a on c.coacademy = a.aid left join maritime.listdata cate on c.cocategory = cate.ldid left join maritime.listdata type on c.cotype = type.ldid left join maritime.listdata examt on c.coexamtype = examt.ldid left join maritime.listdata week on s.sweek = week.ldid left join maritime.listdata section on s.ssection = section.ldid left join maritime.listdata fre on s.frequency = fre.ldid where c.is_selectable = true and c.is_active = true and s.sterm = #{term,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by c.coid

select c.coid,c.coname,c.conumber,t.tname as teacher, a.aname as academy,cate.ldvalue as category,type.ldvalue as type,c.copoint, c.cohour,examt.ldvalue as examtype,s.spositon as position,week.ldvalue as week, section.ldvalue as section,s.sdescription as sdescription,fre.ldvalue as freq, s.all_people as allPeople,s.remain_people as remainPeople,map.pid as mapid,s.sid as scheid from maritime.course c inner join maritime.schedule s on s.scid = c.coid and s.is_active = true left join maritime.scmapping map on s.sterm = map.pterm and map.pcid = c.coid and map.is_active = true left join maritime.teacher t on c.coteacher1 = t.tid left join maritime.academy a on c.coacademy = a.aid left join maritime.listdata cate on c.cocategory = cate.ldid left join maritime.listdata type on c.cotype = type.ldid left join maritime.listdata examt on c.coexamtype = examt.ldid left join maritime.listdata week on s.sweek = week.ldid left join maritime.listdata section on s.ssection = section.ldid left join maritime.listdata fre on s.frequency = fre.ldid where c.is_selectable = true and c.is_active = true and s.sterm = #{term} and map.psid = #{sid} order by c.coid
mapper.insert: insert into maritime.course (coid, coname, conumber, coteacher1, coteacher2, is_active, coacademy, cocategory, cotype, copoint, cohour, codescription, last_update_user, last_update_dt) values (#{coid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{coname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{conumber,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{coteacher1,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{coteacher2,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{isActive,jdbcType=BIT}, #{coacademy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cocategory,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cotype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{copoint,jdbcType=REAL}, #{cohour,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{codescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastUpdateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastUpdateDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update maritime.course set coname = #{coname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, conumber = #{conumber,jdbcType=BIGINT}, coteacher1 = #{coteacher1,jdbcType=BIGINT}, coteacher2 = #{coteacher2,jdbcType=BIGINT}, is_active = #{isActive,jdbcType=BIT}, coacademy = #{coacademy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cocategory = #{cocategory,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cotype = #{cotype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, copoint = #{copoint,jdbcType=REAL}, cohour = #{cohour,jdbcType=INTEGER}, codescription = #{codescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_update_user = #{lastUpdateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_update_dt = #{lastUpdateDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where coid = #{coid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
